evidence.claim: Imaging Heartbeat utilizes AWS to enhance its cloud infrastructure.
The platform supports healthcare standards such as FHIR for data interoperability.
They implement HIPAA compliant practices to ensure data security and privacy.
Integration with EDI X12 transactions is available for medical billing and claims processing.
Use of Azure cloud services for scalable solutions is mentioned in their technical documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of involvement with X12 transactions or clearinghouse services.
